Functions
ManagerView
export default function ManagerView(
{ inventory, menu }
)

Generates manager view page.

Parameters
{inventory, menu}

Object containing inventory and menu properties which are an array of inventory item objects and an array of menu item objects

Returns

<div> tag containing page

underlineInventory
function underlineInventory()

Underlines inventory option and removes underline from menu option.

underlineMenu
function underlineMenu()

Underlines menu option and removes underline for inventory option.

getServerSideProps
export async function getServerSideProps(
context
)

Gets all inventory and menu items for API server.

Parameters
context

browser context that the app is running in

Returns

Object with props property that is an object with inventory and menu properties that are each arrays of the respective type of items
